parameters: You used the \i[195]\ \C[1]Key\c to unlock the door.
You used the \i[195]\ \C[1]Captain's Key\c to unlock the door.
GabText This is the captain's quarters.
GabText The key should be in the storeroom.
It's finally time to steal some \C[1]treasure\c!
Some objects are designated as \C[1]treasure\c and
will show this icon when collected: \i[210]\
You can view these items within your item menu,
Each treasure will have monetary value which will
be added onto your \C[6]gold\c total at the
Try to pick up the \i[210]\ \C[1]Rope\c on your left
and the \C[6]gold\c on your right. Remember you can
interact with them using the [Space] key.
There are also pirates now patrolling the corridors.
If you enter their \C[1]flashlight beam\C they
If they catch you, you will be forced into a \C[1]battle\c
As a thief, you should try and not be spotted at all.
You can \C[1]hide\c in boxes to help you sneak past pirates.
Try hiding in the box on your left below the rope by
GabText I think we can escape through the kitchen.
GabText But if you want more treasure...
GabText That key will unlock the room on the far left.
